# Test registry URLs - DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION
# These are test URLs for fixture testing only

# Local Gitea instances
localhost:3000/test-org/test-app:latest
localhost:3000/test-org/test-app:v1.0.0
localhost:3000/admin/admin-tools:latest

# Example external registries (for URL parsing tests)
gitea.example.com/org/repo:main
gitea.example.com/org/repo:v2.1.0
registry.example.com:5000/namespace/image:tag

# Different protocols
http://localhost:3000/test/http-test:latest
https://secure.example.com/test/https-test:latest

# Edge cases for testing
localhost/no-port/image:latest
example.com:8080/custom-port/image:v1.0
